Instruction: In a large bowl, combine rinsed and drained baked beans, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard, molasses, chopped onion, cooked and chopped bacon, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and black pepper.
Stir everything together until well combined.
Pour the bean mixture into a baking dish.
Bake for 2-3 hours, stirring occasionally, until the beans are thickened and heated through.
An optional step: For the last 30 minutes of baking, you can increase the oven temperature to 350°F (175°C) to create a slightly crispy top on the beans.
Serve warm with your favorite grilled meats or as a side dish.
